headline: CMG Q1 Earnings Call: Chipotle Faces Consumer Slowdown, Leans on Innovation and Expansion
summary: Mexican fast-food chain Chipotle (NYSE:CMG) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 6.4% year on year to $2.88 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.29 per share was 5.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Should You Buy Chipotle Stock Right Now and Hold It for the Next 20 Years?
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) reported its financial results for the first quarter on Wednesday, posting adjusted earnings per share of $0.29, which exceeded Wall Street estimates.  Has that decline set Chipotle up as a stock you should buy now on the dip and hold for the next 20 years?
